invitations.same_org: This person already belongs to your organization.
invitations.other_org: This user already belongs to an organization. Users can only belong to one organization.
invitations.has_invite: This user has already been invited to an organization.

org_roles.admin_description: Admins can add, and remove users from the organization, and create and edit content.
org_roles.contributor_description: Collaborators can create and edit content.
org_roles.owner_description: Owners can access billing information, add and remove users from the organization, and create and edit content.
